item.title: Repositories
item.description: My repositories and other interesting development projects. I'm interested in circular concepts, ideas and projects. I see endless possibilities in effective, safe, and simple code; whether in hobby projects, doing Unix system stuff or security penetration testing. Hobby Plantenbiebs Nederland To make contribution to society by creating apps to stimulate plant exchange in the Benelux. Plantenbiebs Nederland is founded in the summer of 2020. In the year of lockdowns and social isolation, we have found ways in cheer and comfort in houseplants.

item.title: Plantenbiebs Nederland
item.description: I wish to contribute to society by co-creating progressive web apps to stimulate local plant exchange in the Benelux. I’ve made some friends who each runs a plantenbieb in their area succesfully…

item.title: Suberdeal
item.description: PHP code are considered bad practices due to inherent security problems, while it runs 80% of e-commerce of the world. The shopaholic in me started researching by hands-on study on Object Orientated vs Object Distributed architecture…

item.title: About me
item.description: Read about the things I work on and care for. I'll tell you about me, the hardware and software that I use. Beside all i'll publish honorable mentions and other stuff that are worth to share. Also hope to inspire everyone else to create a little something of their own on the internet.
